Notes: A ? Block that spawns items when hit. SplashCoinBlock and TimerCoinBlock spawn Coins, SplashPieceBock and TimerPieceBlock spawn Star Bits, CoinBlock2D spawns a single Coin and ItemBlockSwitch does not spawn any items but it activates SW_DEAD. The "Splash" blocks drop the items immediately when hit. The "Timer" blocks award the player one item each time it's hit. However, these variants will automatically disappear after a timer runs out.

Obj_arg0.Name: Number of Items
Obj_arg0.Description: How many items will be spawned after hitting the block. Default is 8.

SW_DEAD.Description: Gets activated after hitting the block.

Obj_arg1.Name: Hit Timer
Obj_arg1.Description: How long the player is able to hit the block consecutively. Default is 240.

Obj_arg2.Name: Shadow Calculation
Obj_arg2.Description: Specifies how to calculate the shadow.

SW_AWAKE.Description: The object will become visible and resume movement when this switch is activated.

ClippingGroup.Description: Objects in this group are always clipped together.
